summary:
A Frozen cave which then extends into nordic ruins and 
mingles for a while until it then reaches deep in the 
mountains then encounters custom Dwemer Ruin and exits 
on the other side.(Recommended level >30/Clearable)
See Screenshots for the location or wait until it is 
chosen by a random quest.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#0080FF]UNICORN CAVE[/color][/center]

[center][color=#B18904]Frozen cave which then extends into nordic ruins and 
mingles for a while until it then reaches deep in the 
mountains then encounters custom Dwemer Ruin and exits 
on the other side.([/color][color=#FE2E2E]Recommended level >30/Clearable[/color][color=#B18904])
See Screenshots for the location or wait until it is 
chosen by a random quest.[/color][/center]

 	[center][youtube]dOnn-U4G_uQ[/youtube][/center]

[color=#B18904]Dungeon contains:[/color]
 -Enemies 
	-Humanoid >5
	-Creatures >15
	-Undead >10
	-Automatons >15
 -Ingredients >300
 -Gems >40
 -Potions >70
 -Weapons/Armor >25
 -Books > 10
 -Notes
 -Journal
 -etc.

[color=#A9BCF5]Installation:[/color]

  -Place UnicornCave.esp + unicorncave.bsa + unicorncave.bsl into your Skyrim Data folder
  -or use NMM
  -



[color=#F7819F]Uninstallation:[/color]

 -Remove UnicornCave.esp - unicorncave.bsa - unicorncave.bsl from your Skyrim Data folder

  -Manually	
 -Use Skyrim launcher	
 -or NMM	



[color=#81F781]-Bugs/Issues:[/color] 

 -No bugs or errors so far


[color=#E1F5A9]Changelog:[/color]

 -25 May 2012--> 1.2
 -Fixed Everything that was reported in the comments; changed some things like: optimized light, added 2 puzzles, some books, Ingredients, lvl potions, gems, armor weapons...

-26 August 2012 -->  1.3
-Arranged a lot of things, fixed doors, balanced Lvl Locks, added some loot and a Dwarven Katana



[color=#FE9A2E]Credits[/color]

 -ZeniMax Media
 -Skyrim Nexus
 -AstralSystems		  
 -Cataxu
author: 2Trance
